name: Dragon's Horde
description:
Goblins are invading your home
Stealing your treasure
Attacking you
You must defend your home 
Take to the skies, fly around your cave
Breath fire on your foes, Gobble them up, 
Fight tooth and nail
No one else will do it for you
For you... You are a Dragon

Made by Team Confirmed at Media Design School
Prototype 2 - Year 3

Programmers:
James Monk
Sally Gillbanks

Artists:
Max Bainbridge
Zane Bronnimann
Ryan Coates
Janelle Ducker
